docs.lead_paragraph: A CONNOISSEUR and collector of old masters. Mr. Tarkington has a fund of personal experience in the art world which must have made the writing of this novel. treating so largely of dealer wiles and collector vagaries, an undertaking of special relish.

headline.main: Booth Tarkington's New Novel and Other Fiction; RUMBIN GALLERIES By Booth Tarkington. Illustrated by Ritchie Cooper. 305 pp. Garden City, N. Y.: Doubleday, Doran & Co. $2.50.
